location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省武汉市洪山区
location.en: Hongshan District, Wuhan, Hubei, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的一所中华人民共和国教育部直属重点综合性师范大学，是国家“211工程”和“双一流”建设高校。其前身可追溯至1903年创办的文华书院大学部。
description.en: A key comprehensive normal university under the direct administration of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, located in Wuhan, Hubei. It is part of the national "211 Project" and "Double First-Class" initiatives. Its predecessor was the college department of Boone College, founded in 1903.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，现任华中师范大学校长。
description.en: Chinese scholar, current president of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任华中师范大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Party Secretary of Central China Normal University.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，曾为华中师范大学题写校名。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He inscribed the name for Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 1948年在中国共产党支持下创建的大学，邓小平是其创始人之一。其教育学院于1949年并入华中大学。
description.en: A university founded in 1948 with the support of the Communist Party of China, with Deng Xiaoping as one of its founders. Its College of Education merged into Huazhong University in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 华中师范大学的最早前身，始创于1871年，1903年增设大学部。
description.en: The earliest predecessor of Central China Normal University, founded in 1871, with its college department added in 1903.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府于1995年启动的旨在面向21世纪、重点建设100所左右的高等学校和一批重点学科的建设工程。
description.en: A project initiated in 1995 by the government of the People's Republic of China to strengthen about 100 key universities and a number of key disciplines for the 21st century.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国自2015年起实施的高等教育政策，旨在建设一批世界一流大学和一流学科。
description.en: A higher education policy of the People's Republic of China initiated in 2015, aiming to build a number of world-class universities and first-class disciplines.

nodes.id: 优势学科创新平台项目

zh-cn: 优势学科创新平台项目

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国“985工程”的延伸，旨在重点建设一批优势学科领域的创新平台。
description.en: An extension of China's Project 985, aimed at building innovation platforms in advantageous discipline fields.

description.zh-cn: 1912年创立于武昌的私立大学，1952年院系调整时并入华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: A private university founded in Wuchang in 1912, which was merged into Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University) during the 1952 higher education reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 位于广西南宁的大学，其部分院系在1952年院系调整时并入华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: A university in Nanning, Guangxi, parts of which were merged into Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University) during the 1952 higher education reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 位于江西南昌的大学，其部分院系在1952年院系调整时并入华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: A university in Nanchang, Jiangxi, parts of which were merged into Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University) during the 1952 higher education reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 华南师范大学的前身，其部分院系在1952年院系调整时并入华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: The predecessor of South China Normal University, parts of which were merged into Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University) during the 1952 higher education reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 曾位于河南省新乡市的师范学院，1952年院系调整时并入华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: A former normal college in Xinxiang, Henan, which was merged into Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University) during the 1952 higher education reorganization.

nodes.id: 海南师范高等专科学校

zh-cn: 海南师范高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 海南师范大学的前身之一，1952年院系调整时并入华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: A predecessor of Hainan Normal University, which was merged into Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University) during the 1952 higher education reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖北武汉的大学，其部分院系于1962年并入华中师范学院（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: A university in Wuhan, Hubei, parts of which were merged into Central China Normal College (now Central China Normal University) in 1962.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，华中师范大学著名校友。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China and a famous alumnus of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家，曾任华中师范大学校长。
description.en: Chinese historian, former president of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、哲学家，曾任私立华中大学校长。
description.en: Chinese educator and philosopher, former president of the private Huazhong University.

description.zh-cn: 中国哲学家、政治活动家，曾任中原大学校长及华中大学改制委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese philosopher and political activist, former president of Central University and chairman of the Huazhong University Reorganization Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育界人士，曾任华中师范大学校长。
description.en: Chinese educator, former president of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育界人士，曾任华中师范大学校长。
description.en: Chinese educator, former president of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程管理专家，曾任华中师范大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese expert in engineering management, former Party Secretary of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育技术专家，曾任华中师范大学校长。
description.en: Chinese expert in educational technology, former president of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任华中师范大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，曾任华中师范大学校长、党委书记。
description.en: Chinese economist, former president and Party Secretary of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国地理学家，曾任华中师范大学校长。
description.en: Chinese geographer, former president of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 2016年10月24日，在电影《我不是潘金莲》于华中师范大学举行的研讨会上，演员范冰冰因未提前通知校方而到场，被安保人员以安全为由劝离。
description.en: On October 24, 2016, during a seminar for the film 'I Am Not Madame Bovary' at Central China Normal University, actress Fan Bingbing, who appeared without prior notice to the university, was asked to leave by security personnel for safety reasons.

description.zh-cn: 中国女演员、歌手、制片人。在华中师范大学参加活动时曾被劝离。
description.en: Chinese actress, singer, and producer. Was once asked to leave during an event at Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国电影导演、编剧、演员。曾出席在华中师范大学举行的电影《我不是潘金莲》研讨会。
description.en: Chinese film director, screenwriter, and actor. Attended a seminar for the film 'I Am Not Madame Bovary' at Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、编剧。曾出席在华中师范大学举行的电影《我不是潘金莲》研讨会。
description.en: Chinese writer and screenwriter. Attended a seminar for the film 'I Am Not Madame Bovary' at Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国女作家。曾出席在华中师范大学举行的电影《我不是潘金莲》研讨会。
description.en: Chinese female writer. Attended a seminar for the film 'I Am Not Madame Bovary' at Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 一部由冯小刚执导、刘震云编剧的中国电影，其剧组曾在华中师范大学举行研讨会。
description.en: A Chinese film directed by Feng Xiaogang and written by Liu Zhenyun, whose crew held a seminar at Central China Normal University.

nodes.id: 华中师范大学“女德”讲座事件

zh-cn: 华中师范大学“女德”讲座事件

description.zh-cn: 2019年4月18日，华中师范大学举办的一场国学讲座因其内容包含大量“女德”等争议性言论而引发社会广泛批评。
description.en: On April 18, 2019, a lecture on Sinology held at Central China Normal University sparked widespread public criticism due to its content, which included a significant amount of controversial remarks on "female virtue".

description.zh-cn: 湖北省孔子学术研究会成员，因在华中师范大学开设包含“女德”内容的讲座而引发争议。
description.en: A member of the Hubei Provincial Confucius Academic Research Association, who caused controversy by giving a lecture containing "female virtue" content at Central China Normal University.

nodes.id: 湖北省孔子学术研究会

zh-cn: 湖北省孔子学术研究会

description.zh-cn: 一个曾被湖北省政府列为“非法社会组织”的团体。
description.en: An organization once listed as an "illegal social organization" by the Hubei provincial government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一套基于传统儒家思想对女性的道德和行为规范，在现代社会常因其宣扬性别不平等而备受争议。
description.en: A set of moral and behavioral codes for women based on traditional Confucian thought, often controversial in modern society for promoting gender inequality.

description.zh-cn: 中国哲学家、哲学史家，华中师范大学校友。
description.en: Chinese philosopher and historian of philosophy, alumnus of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代革命家，华中师范大学校友。
description.en: Chinese modern revolutionary, alumnus of Central China Normal University.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 华中师范大学是中华人民共和国教育部直属的重点综合性大学。
description.en: Central China Normal University is a key comprehensive university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 彭双阶自2024年1月起担任华中师范大学校长。
description.en: Peng Shuangjie has served as the President of Central China Normal University since January 2024.

description.zh-cn: 夏立新自2022年12月起担任华中师范大学党委书记。
description.en: Xia Lixin has served as the Party Secretary of Central China Normal University since December 2022.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，邓小平为学校更名后的“华中师范大学”题写了校名。
description.en: In 1985, Deng Xiaoping inscribed the school name for the newly renamed "Central China Normal University".

description.zh-cn: 邓小平是中原大学的创始人之一。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was one of the founders of Central University.

description.zh-cn: 华中师范大学的正式校史始于1903年文华书院增设的大学部，文华书院是其最早前身。
description.en: The official history of Central China Normal University began with the college department established by Boone College in 1903, which is its earliest predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 1949年12月，中原大学教育学院并入当时的公立华中大学。
description.en: In December 1949, the College of Education of Central University merged into the then-public Huazhong University.

description.zh-cn: 1952年全国高校院系调整时，私立中华大学并入组建华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: During the 1952 national higher education reorganization, the private Chunghua University was merged to form the Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University).

description.zh-cn: 1952年全国高校院系调整时，广西大学部分院系并入组建华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: During the 1952 national higher education reorganization, parts of Guangxi University were merged to form the Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University).

description.zh-cn: 1952年全国高校院系调整时，南昌大学部分院系并入组建华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: During the 1952 national higher education reorganization, parts of Nanchang University were merged to form the Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University).

description.zh-cn: 1952年全国高校院系调整时，华南师范学院部分院系并入组建华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: During the 1952 national higher education reorganization, parts of South China Normal College were merged to form the Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University).

description.zh-cn: 1952年全国高校院系调整时，平原师范学院并入组建华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: During the 1952 national higher education reorganization, Pingyuan Normal College was merged to form the Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University).

relationships.source: 海南师范高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 1952年全国高校院系调整时，海南师范高等专科学校并入组建华中高等师范学校（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: During the 1952 national higher education reorganization, Hainan Normal Junior College was merged to form the Central China Higher Normal School (now Central China Normal University).

description.zh-cn: 1962年，湖北大学的一部分并入华中师范学院（今华中师范大学）。
description.en: In 1962, a part of Hubei University was merged into Central China Normal College (now Central China Normal University).

description.zh-cn: 2005年，华中师范大学进入211工程重点建设高校名单。
description.en: In 2005, Central China Normal University was included in the list of key construction universities of Project 211.

relationships.target: 优势学科创新平台项目

description.zh-cn: 2007年，华中师范大学获得985创新平台（即优势学科创新平台项目）专项经费支持。
description.en: In 2007, Central China Normal University received special funding support from the 985 Innovation Platform (Project 985 Advantageous Discipline Innovation Platform).

description.zh-cn: 华中师范大学是国家“双一流”建设高校。
description.en: Central China Normal University is a national "Double First-Class" initiative university.

description.zh-cn: 冯友兰是华中师范大学的著名校友。
description.en: Feng Youlan is a famous alumnus of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 宋教仁是华中师范大学的著名校友。
description.en: Song Jiaoren is a famous alumnus of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 恽代英是华中师范大学的著名校友。
description.en: Yun Daiying is a famous alumnus of Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 章开沅于1983年12月至1991年3月间担任华中师范学院院长及华中师范大学校长。
description.en: Zhang Kaiyuan served as the Dean of Central China Normal College and President of Central China Normal University from December 1983 to March 1991.

description.zh-cn: 韦卓民于1929年至1951年担任私立华中大学校长。
description.en: Francis Cho-min Wei served as the President of the private Huazhong University from 1929 to 1951.

position.zh-cn: 华中大学改制委员会主任
position.en: Chairman of Huazhong University Reorganization Committee

description.zh-cn: 潘梓年于1949年至1952年11月担任华中大学改制委员会主任。
description.en: Pan Zinian served as the Chairman of the Huazhong University Reorganization Committee from 1949 to November 1952.

description.zh-cn: 赵凌云曾于2018年7月至2022年12月间先后担任华中师范大学校长、党委书记。
description.en: Zhao Lingyun successively served as President and Party Secretary of Central China Normal University from July 2018 to December 2022.

description.zh-cn: 因未提前通知校方便出现在活动现场，范冰冰在华中师范大学遭到安保人员劝离。
description.en: Due to appearing at an event without prior notice to the university, Fan Bingbing was asked to leave by security personnel at Central China Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 范冰冰劝离事件发生于电影《我不是潘金莲》在华中师范大学举行的研讨会期间。
description.en: The Fan Bingbing incident occurred during a seminar for the film 'I Am Not Madame Bovary' held at Central China Normal University.

relationships.target: 华中师范大学“女德”讲座事件

description.zh-cn: 据称，时任华中师范大学校长的赵凌云邀请了安德义进行引发争议的“女德”讲座。
description.en: It is alleged that Zhao Lingyun, then president of Central China Normal University, invited An Deyi to give the controversial "female virtue" lecture.

relationships.target: 华中师范大学“女德”讲座事件

description.zh-cn: 安德义是引发争议的华中师范大学“女德”讲座的主讲人。
description.en: An Deyi was the speaker at the controversial "female virtue" lecture at Central China Normal University.

relationships.target: 华中师范大学“女德”讲座事件

description.zh-cn: 该讲座因包含大量“女德”内容而引发巨大争议。
description.en: The lecture caused great controversy due to its inclusion of a large amount of "female virtue" content.

relationships.target: 湖北省孔子学术研究会

description.zh-cn: 安德义是湖北省孔子学术研究会的成员。
description.en: An Deyi is a member of the Hubei Provincial Confucius Academic Research Association.

relationships.target: 湖北省孔子学术研究会

description.zh-cn: 湖北省人民政府将湖北省孔子学术研究会列为“非法社会组织”。
description.en: The Hubei Provincial People's Government listed the Hubei Provincial Confucius Academic Research Association as an "illegal social organization".
